name: Untitled Wizard Game
description:
You only have one Inventory Slot and one Life at your disposal, Pick up and Use Items to clear waves of pesky bats and skeletons to get a high-score. 

Casual Rougelike!

The prompt for the Game Jam was "only one"

There is only one inventory slot, only one life, and only one room, but there's also only one developer!

I did all the art, animation, and code. Shout-out to MS Paint.
